channel.description: When you first learned about trees, you also learned about tree traversal algorithms. This is one reason that WPF is organized into a tree - the rendering process actually uses a tree traversal algorithm to determine how large to make each control! You can also traverse the tree yourself, by exploring Child, Children, or Parent properties.
